text: Chenapparambile Aanakkariyam (Malayalam: ചേനപ്പറമ്പിലെ ആനക്കാരൃ൦) is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nissar, starring Sudheesh and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/chenapparambile- aanakkariyam-malayalam-movie/ ==Plot== It is the story of some youngsters who recover their village temple's idol and a precious anklet from a thief. ==Cast== * Mukesh... Gopikrishnan * Jagathy Sreekumar... Jawahar Kuruppu * Sudheesh... Sudhi * Kozhikode Narayanan Nair... Chempakassery Kuttikrishna Menon * Jose Pellissery... Maniykamangalathu Ravunni Menon * Kanakalatha... Kuttikrishna Menon's wife * Kalashala Babu... Rajashekhara Kaimal * Machan Varghese... Bhargavan * Mamukkoya... Advocate Kozhimala Beerankutty * Tony... Prathapan * Meghanathan... Yatheendran * Kuthiravattam Pappu... Oracle * Narayanankutty... Vidhyadharan * Salim Kumar... Uthaman ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Chenapparambile Aanakkariyam
